propertyDescriptor.name: JasperServerURL
propertyDescriptor.description: The baseURL to the server used to load Jasper reports. It is expected to be something like: 'http://myServer.edu/jasperserver'

propertyDescriptor.name: JasperServerUsername
propertyDescriptor.description: The username for the Jasper user that will be running the report. Note that this is expected to be a public account, so this information is not hidden from users who can access this LabKey Server folder

propertyDescriptor.name: JasperServerPassword
propertyDescriptor.description: The password for the Jasper user that will be running the report. Note that this is expected to be a public account, so this information is not hidden from users who can access this LabKey Server folder
